com.audioord.dao

Class BaseEntityDao<E extends Entity<K>,K extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audioord.dao.BaseEntityDao<E,K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityDAO<E,K>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthInfoDao, OrderDAO, OrderDiscountDAO, TrackDAO, TrackFeedbackDAO, UserDAO

    public abstract class BaseEntityDao<E extends Entity<K>,K extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityDAO<E,K>
    abstract generic BaseEntity DAO class, implements EntityDAO

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseEntityDao()
      BaseEntityDao constructor,which determines what will be the source of connections in this case the source of connections is DataBasePool, which is initialized once
      BaseEntityDao(ConnectionSource connectionSource)
      Additional BaseEntityDao constructor, which accepts as an input parameter the source of the connections

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected int countAll(java.lang.String sql) 
      protected int countAll(java.lang.String sql, java.lang.Object... params) 
      protected K create(E entity, EntityMapper<E> mapper, java.lang.String sql)
      Allows to get id of Entity from database using Entity object, EntityMapper and SQL query string createMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement calls EntityMapper.write(PreparedStatement, Entity), which fills PreparedStatement with info of Entity execute this statement and assign to ResultSet
      protected E find(EntityMapper<E> mapper, java.lang.String sql, java.lang.Object... params)
      Allows to get Entity from database using input SQL query string, input EntityMapper and array of Object params also it checks input EntityMapper to null findMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement checks array of Object to null and array size fills PreparedStatement with input params,execute this statement and assign to ResultSet Further there is a creation of Entity object
      protected java.util.List<E> findAll(EntityMapper<E> mapper, java.lang.String sql, java.lang.Object... params)
      Allows to get List of Entity from database using input SQL query string, input EntityMapper and array of Object params also it checks input EntityMapper to null findAllMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement checks array to null and array size fills PreparedStatement with input params,execute this statement and assign to ResultSet Further in the cycle there is a creation of Entity objects and addition to List of Entity
      protected E getById(K id, EntityMapper<E> mapper, java.lang.String sql) 
      protected java.util.List<E> getByIds(EntityMapper<E> mapper, java.lang.String sql, java.util.List<K> ids)
      Allows to get List of Entity from database using input EntityMapper ,input SQL query string and List of parametrized id also it checks input EntityMapper to null getByIdsMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement fills PreparedStatement with input ids, execute this statement and assign to ResultSet Further in the cycle there is a creation of Entity objects and addition to List of Entity
      ConnectionSource getConnectionSource()
      Allows to get source of connections
      protected boolean remove(K id, java.lang.String sql)
      Allows to remove raw from database using parametrized id and input SQL query also it checks input id to null removeMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement and fills it with input id execution of statement returns number of affected rows if it was affected at least one row, it's returns true,otherwise false
      protected boolean update(E entity, EntityMapper<E> mapper, java.lang.String sql)
      Allows to update(create) raw from database using inputEntity object, input EntityMapper and SQL query string also it checks input Entity and EntityMapper to null updateMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement calls EntityMapper.write(PreparedStatement, Entity), which fills PreparedStatement with params of Entity execution of statement returns number of affected rows if it was affected at least one row, it's returns true,otherwise false

      • remove

        protected boolean remove(K id,
                         java.lang.String sql)
                  throws DAOException
        Allows to remove raw from database using parametrized id and input SQL query also it checks input id to null removeMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement and fills it with input id execution of statement returns number of affected rows if it was affected at least one row, it's returns true,otherwise false
        Parameters:
        id - parametrized input id
        sql - SQL query string
        Returns:
        if the number of changed rows is greater than 0 - true, otherwise - false
        Throws:
        DAOException - DAOException

                   EntityMapper<E> mapper,
                   java.lang.String sql)

        Allows to get id of Entity from database using Entity object, EntityMapper and SQL query string createMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement calls EntityMapper.write(PreparedStatement, Entity), which fills PreparedStatement with info of Entity execute this statement and assign to ResultSet

        mapper - EntityMapper
        sql - SQL query string
        Returns:

      • update

        protected boolean update(E entity,
                         EntityMapper<E> mapper,
                         java.lang.String sql)
                  throws DAOException
        Allows to update(create) raw from database using inputEntity object, input EntityMapper and SQL query string also it checks input Entity and EntityMapper to null updateMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement calls EntityMapper.write(PreparedStatement, Entity), which fills PreparedStatement with params of Entity execution of statement returns number of affected rows if it was affected at least one row, it's returns true,otherwise false
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity object
        mapper - EntityMapper
        sql - update(create) SQL query string
        Returns:
        if the number of changed rows is greater than 0 - true, otherwise false
        Throws:
        DAOException - DAOException

        Allows to get List of Entity from database using input EntityMapper ,input SQL query string and List of parametrized id also it checks input EntityMapper to null getByIdsMethod gets connection from ConnectionSource.getConnection(), creates PreparedStatement fills PreparedStatement with input ids, execute this statement and assign to ResultSet Further in the cycle there is a creation of Entity objects and addition to List of Entity
        Parameters:
        mapper - EntityMapper
        sql - get SQL query string
        ids - List of ids
        Returns:
        List of Entity objects
        Throws:
